Delivery & Setup

We deliver directly to your event location and fully set everything up. You don't lift a finger — we handle logistics, timing, and coordination.

You'll even receive a confirmation message before your event so you can relax knowing everything is on schedule.

We focus on timing, comfort, and flawless setup — so your event runs smoothly.

Choose Your Cart

Both options include delivery, pickup, and our full support during your rental.

Standard Golf Cart

Best for smooth rides & casual use

4-seater classic golf cart

From $300+
3-day minimum
  • Clean, traditional golf-course style
  • Designed for flat terrain (golf courses, paved paths, event grounds)
  • Lower ground clearance for a smoother, quieter ride
  • Simple, elegant, and practical

Perfect if you want:

Comfort, simplicity, and reliable transportation for your event.

  • Upgraded wheels and lifted suspension
  • Handles large venues, grass, gravel, and uneven terrain with ease

Transparent Pricing

Standard 4-seater carts from $300+ (3-day min). Luxury 4-seater carts from $450+ (3-day min). Exact total depends on dates and your specific needs.

We confirm total pricing before you commit — all details explained on your quote call.

What Affects Your Price

  • •Rental duration (3-day minimum)
  • •Your location (we deliver nationwide)
  • •Number of carts needed (1-6 available)
  • •Cart type: Standard or Luxury
  • •Peak season / weekend rates

What's Included

  • Nationwide delivery & full setup
  • Pickup when rental ends
  • Fully charged battery
  • Clean, inspected cart
  • Phone support during rental
Call Now (972) 965-6901

Frequently Asked Questions

Standard 4-seater carts start from $300+ for a 3-day minimum. Luxury 4-seater carts start from $450+ for 3 days. Final price depends on rental duration, delivery distance, and cart type. Call (972) 965-6901 for an exact quote.

Yes! We deliver to RV parks, resorts, campgrounds, and event venues throughout Tyler and East Texas. Delivery and pickup are included.

Absolutely. Wedding transportation is one of our specialties. Our 4-seater carts are perfect for large venues, helping guests move between ceremony and reception areas. Book early — weddings fill our calendar fast.

3-day minimum on all cart rentals. This applies to both standard and luxury 4-seater carts.

Usually within 30 minutes during business hours (Mon-Sun 8AM-6PM). Text is fastest. Call (972) 965-6901 or submit a quote form.

Yes. Delivery and pickup are included throughout Tyler and East Texas. We coordinate timing with you and handle all logistics.

We deliver to Tyler, Longview, Jacksonville, Henderson, Lindale, Whitehouse, Kilgore, Marshall, Canton, Athens, Mineola, Gladewater, and surrounding East Texas communities.

As early as possible. Weekends and holidays book fast. 2-4 weeks ahead is recommended, especially for events and peak summer season.

Yes. Every cart arrives fully charged and inspected. We include phone support during your rental if you have any questions.

We rent Club Car and EZGO golf carts. All are 4-seater models, clean, and well-maintained.
